body: J.F. String in Hemispheric Brief reports: "An international showdown between the US and Bolivia has officially begun. The matter under dispute: whether or not an international ban on coca-leaf chewing should be pulled from the 1961 United Nations Single Convention on Narcotic Drugs."
original_body: J.F. String in Hemispheric Brief reports: "An international showdown between the US and Bolivia has officially begun. The matter under dispute: whether or not an international ban on coca-leaf chewing should be pulled from the 1961 United Nations Single Convention on Narcotic Drugs."
title: "Showdown" between US and Bolivia over UN coca ban

sentence: J.F. String in Hemispheric Brief reports: "An international showdown between the US and Bolivia has officially begun.
The matter under dispute: whether or not an international ban on coca-leaf chewing should be pulled from the 1961 United Nations Single Convention on Narcotic Drugs."
